statements: DELETE FROM appointments WHERE provider_id = '23456789-2345-2345-2345-23456789bcde' AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = '34567890-3456-3456-3456-34567890cdef' AND appointment_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location LIKE '%Hospital%';
DELETE FROM Providers WHERE provider_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Cancelled';
DELETE FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date_of_birth) > 1990;
DELETE FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Cancelled' AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM appointment_date) = 10;
